comment: Jeff is by far the best teacher I have ever had. His lectures were amazing and he's a fantastic person who really knows what he's talking about. He loves talking about the material and he gives you tons of great information. Tests are a little challenging but if you study what he tells you to and pay attention you should ace them. Great course.

Jeff Chastine is probably the best professor in the state of Georgia. He made Algorithm Analysis a fun, enjoyable, and NOT TERRIFYING class! It was awesome! I went in to the class very anxious, but I really learned a lot and it was all thanks to Jeff!

This professor is awesome! He answers all questions, is respectful to students, and gives feedback on everything. The course I took is assumed to be a senior-level class, with prerequisites that had to be filled prior. If you did not know what he was doing in-class, he had online readings to catch up. He helped everyone to his best ability!

He is a really funny professor and has a great view of his students. He is extremely helpful and he treats his students like adults. The only downside of his class is his TA. He grades so strictly and you can't get a good grade on written assignments. His exams (mid and final) were hilarious  since he wrote them in story format. Awesome prof.

If I have to take a class, I attempt to take the one taught by this professor. He makes things so easy to understand and he does live programming in class. He has exceptional knowledge on the topics he teaches. He is also extremely helpful outside of class and didn't mind me pestering him for help all the time.

Exceptional professor.  I would take any course he offered.  Grading was returned reasonably quickly.  Help was offered any time (except ON the due date).  Tests were 90% on material reviewed in the exam review.  I learned more in this course than in 90% of other classes, and he made it fun and kept the students competing to do extra.
If you want to learn how to make a video game take his course. Material is pretty tough but just study and do the projects to get a decent grade
Best Professor i ever had. He makes class a lot of fun.
Great professor one of the few in the CS department that loves his job.  If you can take him do so you will have great learning experience.
Best Professor I ever had. Highly Recommended

One of the best professors I have ever had.  I wasn't a big gamer before taking his class, but he definitely peaked my interest.  He is good looking, smart, very knowledgable, and makes class fun.  He is also very approachable and willing to help outside of class if you ask.  If you get the opportunity, definitely take his class.

Best professor I've ever had. Works out examples with the class, knows this stuff very well. When you complete his class you will know what you're doing and be good at it. Relates to the students extremely well and keeps his class entertaining.
Best professor I have ever had. He puts other professors to shame. Made me look forward to coming to class.

This teacher was very easy to get along with and understand, his assignments aren't ridiculous or extreme, and by the end of it, we made a board game and critiqued ourselves. He was (I think) an administrator at another school, so he knows how to lead a class, despite the fact we were all talkative gaming nerds. He made more game references than us

If you can ever get Dr. Chastine as a teacher, do it! He's very fun, makes the class interesting, and loves what he teaches. Very approachable, funny, and down-to-earth. He explains concepts very well and grades fairly. Expect to do an average amount of work in all of his classes; everything he assigns is interesting and relevant.

Great Professor, makes class fun for everyone. He is lenient with late grades, but the assignments and tests are easy. The midterm and final were only 4 questions each (!) He is a gaming nerd, and treats everyone like friends over students, he makes you call him Jeff instead of Professor or Mr. Chastine

Great Professor, he is very friendly, approachable, funny, knowledgable, and easy on the eyes.  He is an overall great professor, I felt really unsure about the material when I started the class but by the end of the class my confidence level really increased and I feel really knowledgable about everything we covered.
Great professor. Always in a good mood and always makes jokes.
